resources.string: Rules: The player tries to guess a word and has a limited of guesses, if the player dosent mangage to guess the word within the amount of guesses, the player wil be hanged. Press the back button in the top left corner to go back to the main menu.
Do you want to play more? Push the button below
Congratulations, you managed to guess the word. Do you want to play again?
